overview: Spotlight on a new form of literature : Threads. After the novel-to-film adaptation, BLEAK: WHO is the first Prime Video fiction adapted from a Twitter thread. Recently, Twitter's users became even more creative and pushed the limits of literature through these short, often interactive stories, told in the form of several linked tweets.
tagline: Squeezie's first short film adapted from his Twitter thread.
title: Bleak : Who
